item.title: Android Development with ChatGPT
item.description: Reliability was an issue but it was refreshing to get responses based on conceptual questions. A refreshing alternative to using a traditional search engine.

item.title: About
item.description: Education Public schools in the Saddleback Valley Unified School District and Saddleback College make up my educational experience. Interests Furthering my knowledge in Game Engine development Exploring DAWs for music development The development of apps through Android Studio Researching new softwares and technologies Skills The languages I know best include C++ and C, Java, Python, and RISC-V. Server stacks such as LAMP, MEAN , and NMP.

item.title: my first blog
item.description: hello world in languages I know #include<iostream> int main(){ std::cout << "hello person!" << std::endl; return 0; } printf("hello again!") public static void main(String[]args){ System.out.println("Hello once more!\n"); }
